title: Largest Component and Sharpness in Subcritical Continuum Percolation
authors: Niclas K\"upper and Mathew D. Penrose
abstract:
We investigate the behavior of large connected components in the Random
Connection Model in the subcritical regime with any bounded connection
function. We show that the asymptotic size of the largest component restricted
to a window is the log of the volume of that window. We adopt methods from the
discrete setting, including a sharpness result.
